mods:mods.abstract: Published annually since 1966, the college catalog is the official record of programs and classes offered at Florida State College at Jacksonville (formerly Florida Junior College and Florida Community College at Jacksonville). The catalogs in this collection are also available in digital format at https://catalog.fscj.edu.
